price: (31) And they said, "Why was this Qur’ān not sent down upon a great man from [one of] the two cities?"[1439]
arabic: وَقَالُواْ لَوۡلَا نُزِّلَ هَٰذَا ٱلۡقُرۡءَانُ عَلَىٰ رَجُلٖ مِّنَ ٱلۡقَرۡيَتَيۡنِ عَظِيمٍ

version.title: English Translation - Saheeh International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English - Saheeh International - Al-Muntada Al-Islami (Islamic Forum)

meta.transliteration: waqālū lawlā nuzzila hādhā al-qur'ānu ʿalā rajulin mina al-qaryatayni ʿaẓīmin
